1.0.name: wordpress/wprealestate
1.0.description:
Specially for real estate agents and people who are willing to list their property listing on their own site.

If you are looking to build a site where you can list property for sale or rent, this is the plugin you need.

Features

Add Property Add multiple property photos jQuery photo slider in property detailed view all property options so you can add any type of property listing multiple categories Property search widget - can be added in sidebar
